episodes.title: Dr. Steven Hassan: MAGA is a Cult
episodes.description: Dr. Steven Hassan is a licensed mental health professional and recognized expert on cults. His book, The Cult of Trump , examines how Trump has built a base with fanatical devotion. Dr. Hassan correctly predicted that there would be violence after the 2020 election if Trump did not win. In this interview, Hassan explains in detail how he was indoctrinated by the “Moonie” cult (the Unification Church), how he escaped, and the dangers of MAGA mind control.
